Release steps
section.para:
Environment: Maven version: 2.0.8 Java version: 1.5.0_16 OS name: "mac os x" version: "10.5.6" arch: "i386" Family: "unix"
1. Run mvn clean install -Prelease Dpersistence=hibernate. 2. Copy the release artifacts to people.apache.org:/public_html/releases/juddi-3.0.0.alpha 3. Start a vote referencing the build artifacts, leave the vote open for 72 hrs.
On successfull vote: 4. Create a Tag in SVN for the release 5. Run mvn clean deploy -Prelease -Dpersistence=hibernate 6. Update the website
